retroGames.name: Mario Bros
retroGames.overview: Mario Bros is a game where Mario and Luigi must defeat creatures coming from the sewers.

retroGames.name: The Legend of Zelda
retroGames.overview: The Legend of Zelda is an action-adventure game featuring Link on a quest to rescue Princess Zelda.

retroGames.name: Pac-Man
retroGames.overview: Pac-Man is an arcade game where the player controls Pac-Man through a maze, eating pellets and avoiding ghosts.

retroGames.name: Donkey Kong
retroGames.overview: Donkey Kong is an arcade game where the player controls Jumpman (Mario) to save Pauline from Donkey Kong.

retroGames.name: Tetris
retroGames.overview: Tetris is a puzzle game where players must fit falling tetrominoes into complete lines.

retroGames.name: Space Invaders
retroGames.overview: Space Invaders is a shooter game where players defeat waves of aliens with a laser cannon.

retroGames.name: Metroid
retroGames.overview: Metroid is a sci-fi action-adventure game where players control Samus Aran on a mission to retrieve stolen Metroid creatures.

retroGames.name: Mega Man
retroGames.overview: Mega Man is a side-scrolling platform game where players control a robot named Mega Man to defeat evil robots.

retroGames.name: Castlevania
retroGames.overview: Castlevania is an action-platformer where players control Simon Belmont on a quest to defeat Dracula.

retroGames.name: Street Fighter II
retroGames.overview: Street Fighter II is a fighting game where players compete in one-on-one battles with various characters.

retroGames.name: Sonic the Hedgehog
retroGames.overview: Sonic the Hedgehog is a platformer where players control Sonic to stop Dr. Robotnik from taking over the world.

retroGames.name: Contra
retroGames.overview: Contra is a run-and-gun game where players control commandos to fight against an alien invasion.

retroGames.name: Final Fantasy
retroGames.overview: Final Fantasy is an RPG where players control the Warriors of Light to save the world from darkness.

retroGames.name: Double Dragon
retroGames.overview: Double Dragon is a beat 'em up game where players control martial artists to rescue a kidnapped girl.

retroGames.name: Duck Hunt
retroGames.overview: Duck Hunt is a shooter game where players use a light gun to shoot ducks on screen.

retroGames.name: Galaga
retroGames.overview: Galaga is a fixed shooter arcade game where players control a spaceship to destroy enemy formations.

retroGames.name: Frogger
retroGames.overview: Frogger is an arcade game where players guide a frog across a busy road and a river full of hazards.

retroGames.name: Punch-Out!!
retroGames.overview: Punch-Out!! is a boxing game where players control Little Mac to fight various opponents.

retroGames.name: Q*bert
retroGames.overview: Q*bert is an arcade game where players control a character to change the colors of a pyramid of cubes.

retroGames.name: Dragon's Lair
retroGames.overview: Dragon's Lair is an interactive movie game where players guide Dirk the Daring to rescue Princess Daphne.
